sentences.en: " I suppose it had jigsaw work on the porch banisters? "
sentences.cn: " 我想回廓上还有 锯齿形 的栏杆吧?

sentences.en: A jigsaw puzzle can keep me absorbed for hours.
sentences.cn: 一副拼图就能让我沉醉几个小时.

sentences.en: Can I have both the puppet monkey and the jigsaw puzzle?
sentences.cn: “我能把木偶猴子和拼图游戏都买下来 吗 ?”

sentences.en: David shared a book of jigsaw puzzles depicting ocean creatures.
sentences.cn: David和我们分享了海洋生物拼图.

sentences.en: Designing a machine vision system is like assembling a jigsaw.
sentences.cn: 设计一套机器视觉系统就像是在组合一幅拼图.

sentences.en: For Nancy Molineaux , another piece of the jigsaw fell into place.
sentences.cn: 对南希·莫利诺来说, 这局拼板游戏又拼好了一块.

sentences.en: Have you finished the jigsaw yet?
sentences.cn: 你拼好那个拼图了 吗 ?

sentences.en: It's a big piece of the jigsaw, but it's not everything.
sentences.cn: 这是拼图中挺大的一块, 但不是全部.

sentences.en: One piece of the jigsaw is still missing.
Spread out all the pieces before you begin the jigsaw.
sentences.cn: 拼图之前先把所有的小片摊开.

sentences.en: The police managed to piece together the jigsaw and reconstruct the victim's last hours.
sentences.cn: 警方成功地将线索拼在一起,重现了受害人生前最后几个小时的情况.

sentences.en: They can be fitted back together as though they were pieces of a giant jigsaw puzzle.
sentences.cn: 但每一堆碎块好像巨大的积木板一样可以很好地拼在一起.

sentences.en: This process is akin to piecing together a jigsaw puzzle.
We keep trying to put the jigsaw puzzle together.
sentences.cn: 我们继续尝试这种拼图游戏.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 七巧板；智力拼图玩具

trans.tran_cn: 竖锯，钢丝锯，拼图玩具，锯曲线机
trans.tran_en: a tool for cutting out shapes in thin pieces of wood
